fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Bolster: When in a duel, immediately draw 2 cards.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Intimidate: Gain a Trap?! or a Confound?!. [2 uses, 4 CD]
- Bloodthirsty: Lose 1HP to gain a random card OR lose 2HP to gain a non special card of your choice.  [Infinite uses, 2 CD] 
- Pummel: Pick a player. Deal 2 HP Unblockable damage to them at the end of the phase. Cannot be the same player targeted by the Chaos night attack. Gains a use every 3rd player you Kill. [1 use, 3CD, Recharging, Astral, 0/3]
